content.description: A solid disk of mass <math alttext="M" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, radius <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and rotational inertia <math alttext="I" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is free to rotate about a fixed frictionless axis that is perpendicular to the disk through its center, as shown above. A force of constant direction and constant magnitude <math alttext="F" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is exerted on the disk.
content.question: If the disk accelerates from rest at time <math alttext="lowercase t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> , through what angle <math alttext="theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Î¸</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> does the disk rotate from <math alttext="lowercase t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="lowercase t equals uppercase T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>T</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction F times R, times uppercase T squared over 2 M, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>R</mi><msup><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction F times R, times uppercase T squared over 2 I, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>R</mi><msup><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction F times uppercase T squared over 2 I, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><msup><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction F times uppercase T squared over M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction F times R, times uppercase T over I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction F times R, times uppercase T squared over 2 I, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>R</mi><msup><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
